title: Adjusting Training After Injury or Illness
head: Training weeks lost
Cross-train: Yes
Cross-train: No
body: Revise race goal. Start back with 1 week of base training, then resume schedule.
Resume schedule. Adjust workout paces for 1-2 weeks.
Revise race goal. Start back with 2 weeks of base training, then resume schedule, and adjust workout paces.
Revise race goal. Start back with base training, then resume schedule, and adjust workout paces.
